creator: OpenText Corp.
descriptionHtml:
OpenText Core Share is a cloud-based file sharing and collaboration app that lets you easily and securely store, share, access and work with your pics, videos and documents from your Android device and the web. It’s the simple, secure and smart way to share and collaborate on files. Sign up is fast and free – you’ll have 2 GB of space and be sharing, collaborating and getting things done in no time!

OpenText Core Share file sharing and collaboration in the cloud makes connecting the right people with the right files easy. No matter what device they are using – phone, tablet or web – collaborators can get fast and easy access to your files, edit and comment on them and instantly save them.

In the interest of respecting regional privacy regulations, OpenText Core Share offers data centers in North America and Europe.

Features:

• Easily and securely store, share and collaborate on your files across all of your devices.

• Instantly save pics, videos and documents to the cloud.

• View and edit files, even when you're offline.

• Edit files on the go and instantly save them – no more waiting to sync files or store duplicate files on all of your devices.

• Sign up is free and fast – you’ll get 2GB of space and be sharing and collaborating on your files in no time!

• Team, Business and Enterprise subscriptions with more storage, advanced file version control, and increased file size limits are also available.

• Safeguard your most important docs, pics and videos in the secure OpenText Cloud.


Terms of Service: https://core.opentext.com/terms
Terms of Service: https://core.opentext.eu/terms
descriptionShort: A Better Way to Share and Collaborate in the Cloud.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Another update, and another round of great improvements and features!

• Table of Contents: You can now view the table of contents of documents. By opening a document that has a table of contents, you can use the more menu (...) to open the table of contents.

• Thanks to the team's hard work, you’ll see some improved performance and some issues that have disappeared.

Check out our new YouTube channel with a growing list of how-to videos at http://bit.ly/2oV5kpe.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Another update, and another round of great improvements and features!

• Users can now see the current page number of the document and a total page count (as in, Page 2 of 10) for the document being viewed.

• Thanks to the team's hard work, you’ll see some improved performance and some issues that have disappeared.

Check out our new YouTube channel with a growing list of how-to videos at http://bit.ly/2oV5kpe.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Open and edit Microsoft Office documents from Core Share through the Microsoft Office app, and save them back to Core Share. To do this, open an Office document in the viewer, tap on the ( . . . ) icon, and tap on "Edit in Office". Users will be taken to the Microsoft Office app where they'll be able to interact with the document.

Raising minimum OS requirement: Devices with Android 5 and 6 can continue using the app. Newer versions of the app hereon will only support Android 7 and above.

descriptionShort: A Better Way to Share and Collaborate in the Cloud.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: With this release comes the concept of “Collections.” Core Share Collections offer a way to group files and folders without copying them or changing the content hierarchy. They enable users to easily organize their content in ways that make sense for their collaborative projects. Collections can be created and shared through the web, and viewed on mobile. While all Core Share users can view Collections (based on permissions), only Enterprise Tier users can create and share Collections.

OpenText Core Share file sharing and collaboration in the cloud makes connecting the right people with the right files easy. No matter what device they are using – phone, tablet or web – collaborators can get fast and easy access to your files, edit and comment on them and instantly save them.

In the interest of respecting regional privacy regulations, OpenText Core Share offers data centers in North America and Europe.

Features:

• Easily and securely store, share and collaborate on your files across all of your devices.

• Instantly save pics, videos and documents to the cloud.

• View and edit files, even when you're offline.

• Edit files on the go and instantly save them – no more waiting to sync files or store duplicate files on all of your devices.

• Sign up is free and fast – you’ll get 2GB of space and be sharing and collaborating on your files in no time!

• Team, Business and Enterprise subscriptions with more storage, advanced file version control, and increased file size limits are also available.

• Safeguard your most important docs, pics and videos in the secure OpenText Cloud.


Terms of Service: https://core.opentext.com/terms
Terms of Service: https://core.opentext.eu/terms
descriptionShort: A Better Way to Share and Collaborate in the Cloud.
